name: Happy Fruit Blast
description:
Welcome to the paradise of fruit candy world!
Happy fruit blast is a free game.
The Candy world was filled with the sweet smell wonderful fairy tale, everything in the world is sugar made from candy, even delicious fruit on the trees. Winnie daisy grow up happily in the forest.
Look! She picks up a basket of fruit in candy beckoned like you do! You will love here.


Happy fruit blast features:
- ALL FREE
This is a completely free game, even the props is completely free!
- SWEET TIME
More than 50 kinds of delicious sweet fruit sugar.
- 3 MATCH PUZZLE
Savor sweet success as you match colorful candies, solve perplexing puzzles.
- TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
Over 1000 awesome levels! Updates will be continued!
- EASY AND FUN PLAY
Easy to play interface, Just swap & match.
- NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
Games you can play offline.
- SURPRISE
Fine art, good music, smooth animation effects.


HOW TO PLAY
• Swipe to match 3 or more fruit candy.
• Collect the fruits, and complete the levels!
• With the colorful and powerful boosters, it is easier to try a level!
• Enjoy other various missions!
• Achieve 3 stars to get more coins!

Happy fruit blast is suitable for all countries and all language.
Happy fruit blast is one of the best matching and puzzle game!
You will fall in love with new props mode.
With the colorful and powerful items, you can get rid of all obstacles.


New elimination play.
You will fall in love with new props mode, it is also free.
Download it now and Enjoy your happy time!
